question: 1. In DES input, key length ___ bits and plaintext length ____ bits.
2. DES stands for _________ and AES stands for __________

answers.a: Data Encryption software, Advanced Encryption Software
answers.b: Data Encryption Standard, Advanced Encryption Standard
answers.c: Data Encryption System, Advanced Encryption System
